name: Digital Library |Notion Template (Dark)
description: I’ve created this FREE Notion Template to help you read more, stay organized, and effortlessly track your progress to elevate your reading experience.This template includes: An easy-to-use database where you can categorize your books, rate and track your readings A space for all your annotations, quotes, notes, and thoughts. Aesthetic yet functional widgets. A Spotify playlist featuring instrumental music to accompany your reading journey. and more... ➙ Click 'Duplicate' in the top-right corner
features: An easy-to-use database where you can categorize your books, rate and track your readings; A space for all your annotations, quotes, notes, and thoughts.; Aesthetic yet functional widgets.; A Spotify playlist featuring instrumental music to accompany your reading journey.; and more...; Give this template a 5-star ☆☆☆☆☆; Follow us on socialsInstagram|Threads|Facebook|Pinterest|X; Tip/DonateKo-fiorBuy me a coffeeif you enjoy my work ♡
